title: I dreamed that I was looking at the sky and there was a full moon and a half moon

preview.html: I dreamed that I was looking at the sky and it had a full moon and a half moon. Often while we sleep, we have dreams that feel like we are in reality, so you go through situations and see people that you might have seen in reality. It can remain on you even after waking up, and this topic has attracted the attention of many since ancient times. The ancient Egyptians believed that these dreams were divine messages, and with the development of science, especially psychology and neuroscience, scientists saw that dreams are thoughts stored in memory, feelings and worries that the brain suppresses during sleep. Possible interpretations of the dream in which I dreamed that I was looking at the sky and in it there was a full moon and a crescent moon. Stages of sleep in humans During sleep, we go through several stages that differ in the depth of sleep and the state of the body in each stage. There are two types of sleep. The stages of sleep are divided on the basis of these, i.e. non-rapid eye movement, which includes the first stages of sleep before deep sleep is reached. Each stage takes from 5 to 15 minutes. The first stage is when the eyes are closed but the person is still relatively alert to what is going on around him and in the second stage the body temperature begins to drop, the heartbeat decreases and the person's awareness of those around him decreases. . Rapid brain data waves begin to activate unevenly after 90 minutes of sleep, breathing increases and becomes regular, eyes begin to move, limb muscles pause, heart rate and blood pressure accelerate slightly, this is the phase. Which begins a person to see dreams. Causes of recurring dreams There are several reasons that lead to an increase in dreams, which are more profound and influential. Feeling anxious, psychologically depressed, sad or depressed, and many thoughts lead to many disturbing dreams and irregular sleep periods, or taking certain types of medications such as stress medications and sleep aid medications leads to rapid access. As for the stage of sleep and deep dreaming, drinking stimulant drinks rich in caffeine or eating fatty meals before sleep leads to discomfort in the body, and its disturbance manifests itself in the form of nightmares. Seeing the crescent and the moon in a dream Seeing the crescent or the moon shows a good man who has knowledge and jurisprudence and can follow him and take advice. From him, the moon is in his house, so this indicates that the ruler or ruler will descend upon the city and may descend upon the city. His home.Seeing more than one moon in a dreamSeeing more than one moon in the sky in a dream indicates an abundance of bananas and love, and if the one who sees two moons is single, it means that he will soon marry a beautiful girl. Seeing more than one moon means goodness and nourishment, stopping distress and anguish, and healing from illness. Interpretation of seeing shapes in the sky Seeing the sky in a dream means goodness, success, transcendence, and high status, and seeing the sky for one person means marriage soon, and whoever sees the stars shining in the sky, this means happiness and comfort. Mind and loyalty. Desires. Some problems between her and her husband. At the end of the...

title: Interpretation of climbing the stairs in a dream for a single woman, according to Ibn Sirin: Is her skin good or bad?

preview.html: Interpretation of climbing stairs in a dream for a single woman. In this article, we explain to you from the Encyclopedia the interpretation of climbing stairs in a dream in detail. Seeing stairs is considered one of the strange visions for the dreamer, and it also falls within the framework of mysterious visions that the dreamer does not understand their meanings in reality. Mahmoud about her? You can find out in the following lines. The symbol of climbing the stairs in a single woman’s dream. Ibn Sirin stated that the interpretation of climbing the stairs in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the distinctiveness of her personality in reality. Also, the dream of climbing stairs indicates the love that she enjoys in reality. It also expresses her effort in achieving her goals on the ground. If an unmarried woman sees that she is climbing the stairs quickly, this indicates that she will earn her living from marriage or success at work. If the dreamer has difficulty climbing the stairs in a dream, this is a sign of the problems he faces. In reality. The previous vision also shows that the dreamer achieves his goals after fatigue and difficulty. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is climbing the stairs in a dream with a dead person, this indicates the problems she faces with others. If an unmarried woman dreams of climbing a broken ladder in a dream, this indicates A sign of the obstacles that you are experiencing. This vision is a promising vision of improving the dreamer’s health if he is suffering from some diseases in reality. When you dream that you are climbing an unfinished staircase, this is an undesirable sign for a single woman, because it indicates the difficulties that the dreamer is facing. Interpretation of seeing a wooden staircase In a dream for a single woman: As for the meaning of seeing one climbing a wooden staircase in a dream for a single woman, this indicates the dreamer’s effort to achieve his goals in reality. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is climbing a broken wooden staircase, this means that someone will harm her in reality, and God I know. In the case of climbing an iron ladder in a dream, the meaning of this lies in the dreamer’s independence and not relying on others to achieve what he wants. Interpretation of climbing escalators for individuals When you dream of climbing an escalator, the meaning of this lies in achieving what the dreamer desires in reality. In the event that he sees The dreamer is climbing an escalator towards the sky, this is a sign of achieving distinction and supremacy. If the dreamer sees the elevator going down, this indicates her failure to achieve her goals. Descending the stairs in a dream for a single woman. As for the meaning of descending the stairs in a dream for an unmarried woman, the vision reflects the psychological state Bad because of the difficulties she faces on the academic level. If a single woman dreams that she is going down the stairs quickly, this means that she is worried about something in reality. Among the undesirable signs of seeing stairs in a dream for a single woman is that it is a sign that she is leaving her job. When she dreams of going down Stairs in a dream with a dead person, this indicates the dreamer’s poor health, and God knows best. But when he dreams of descending the stairs of a mosque with the dead, this indicates that the dreamer desires to get closer to God and stay away from forbidden things. When there is difficulty in descending the stairs in a dream, then

title: Interpretation of a dream about oak trees and acorns in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing oak trees and oak trees in a dream. One of the things that has a special and intense meaning is an oak tree in a dream, but what does it appear and what does it mean? What is the strong message of an oak tree? You may also be interested in knowing about food in a dream. It should be noted that dreams and their interpretation differ from one person to another depending on the social and material circumstances of each person and the other. You may also be interested in: Airplane in a dreamInterpretation of seeing oak trees and oak trees in a dreamA vision Oak trees in a dream are generally a good vision and not unpleasant. Whether they are oak trees or acorns, seeing them in a dream is not long. Oaks in a dream in a way indicate strength, health and longevity, as well as good and abundance, close to nourishment and an important discovery. It also indicates abundance. Money, and coming out of difficult times filled with sorrows, into a time full of joy, pleasure, and happiness. If the dreamer owns a project, his project will continue to be successful and last as long as possible. Oak trees have a long lifespan, so this indicates that the dreamer will move away from people and enter a period of introspection with The same, because oak trees are found above mountains and high mountains.Interpretation of seeing oak trees and oak trees in a dreamInterpretation of seeing oak in a dream by Ibn SirinAccording to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing the same oak tree in a dream means a lot of sustenance, as well as a lot of money for the dreamer.A tree suggests The oak is also the young man who is difficult to live with, but he is generous and well-off. As Ibn Sirin says that the oak is a long-lived tree, this indicates that this person has a long life and a long life. It can also indicate the length of time that the dreamer is going through, either a period of sadness or a period of Joy. You may be interested in: The girl in the dream. The interpretation of seeing an oak and acorns in a dream according to Nabulsi. As for the dream interpreter, Al-Nabulsi believes that the oak tree can indicate travel and exile, as well as a period of severe estrangement from the family and homeland. He also says in some dreams that the oak tree can To mean a man with dark skin, but he is cunning and has a malicious personality. You may be interested: Crying and oppression in a dream. Interpretation of seeing oak trees and acorns in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. The interpreter Ibn Shaheen says that the oak tree in a dream shows a great man who has prestige, power, and money, in addition to being wealthy. But he is a cunning and malicious person. He also says that an oak tree in a dream could mean that the fortuneteller collects his money as a result of the cunning and deception that he deals with people. An oak tree in a dream can also be interpreted as an indication that the dreamer and the individual are miserable. You may be interested in: Seeing Home and room furniture in a dream. Interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream. Seeing an oak tree in a dream means a great man who is firm in his position. Also, an oak in a dream means food, kindness, and a lot of money, which will last for a period of time, because the oak is perennial. Whoever dreams that he is leaning on an oak tree, this It symbolizes and indicates that he is dependent on a great big man, with money and prestige

title: Interpretation of seeing children in a dream, sucking and licking a dream

preview.html: Seeing the licking of the penis, breasts, anus, vulva, and chest, expelling milk or semen, and breastfeeding an unmarried, married, or pregnant girl dreamed of breastfeeding a child. According to Ibn Sirin. And whoever sees that she is breastfeeding is humiliation and sadness. Whoever dreams that a person or animal is taking care of him from a place that does not need to be breastfed, then he will face a difficult situation. Whoever dreams that he is breastfeeding and does not know, there is no good in him. Whoever dreams that an animal is breastfeeding him means obtaining money and benefit. He said Al-Kirmani: The dream of breastfeeding means obtaining money, and if it is from a human being or from an animal whose meat is not eaten, then... It is forbidden, and if it is from an animal whose meat can be eaten, then it is lawful wealth, and it was said: The pearl is a mercy from a person. And whoever dreams that he is breastfeeding, whether it is blood or an animal, and if liquid comes out of the breast, whether its type is liked or disliked, then it is wealth, and if it is solid then it is not Praise be to Him, and it was said: It is beneficial unless it has the quality of spirit or movement, and if there is something in it then it is a warner, and if this thing is loved then it is a good child, and if it is disliked it is rejected. And if a woman sees a man breastfeeding from her milk, then he will take from her what she breastfed. It is disliked. If a woman sees that a man is breastfeeding her, it will not benefit her, but as for another woman breastfeeding her: there is disagreement. It was said: Whoever dreams that he is breastfeeding a boy, or is being breastfed, the door will be closed for him, and it will have a severe effect on him. As for breastfeeding a penis, it is good for the nurse and the wet nurse, and goodness. The need is fulfilled and fulfilled. The dream of sucking and hugging the man or the chest, anus, and vulva - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream of a single woman

preview.html: Our article today from our website includes an explanation of the meaning of seeing containers for single women, pregnant women, married women, young people and men. Interpretation of seeing containers in a dream for a single girlWhen an unmarried girl dreams of seeing containers in a dream, this is a sign that she will achieve everything she wants. Everyone who was free to study and see Ships symbolize success and achieving excellence. If he is looking for a job and dreams that he is watching utensils, then this dream is good for a good job opportunity. An unmarried woman who has never been married and has reached the age of marriage, sees dishes in a dream. It is a metaphor for preaching in the near future. And if the dishes Clean, this is a sign of her engagement to a handsome young man who suits her. If the bowls are dirty, it indicates dealing with a disabled young man. As for an engaged girl who dreams of seeing bowls in a dream, it is a symbol of completing the engagement, approaching the wedding date and living a happy life. See also: Interpretation Dreaming of food in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing dishes in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees herself washing dishes in a dream. That is, she reconciles with her husband after a period of quarreling. The vision also suggests the continuous renewal of her life as a result of the love that exists between her and her husband. Seeing washing dishes in a married woman’s dream indicates On marital happiness and the end of problems. To see yourself cleaning the dishes and shining in a dream of marriage. This indicates that news of pregnancy will be heard in the near future for those who are late in having children. As for the married woman who sees herself washing many dishes, they were of various materials and colors. They are A sign of changing her lifestyle for the better. If a married woman sees that she was washing plastic dishes in a dream, it is a sign of poverty, lack of money, and a change in life for the worse. As for the vision of washing gold or silver utensils, it is a metaphor for a bright future, happiness, and stability of circumstances. Interpretation of seeing dishes. In a dream about a man and its meaning. As for a man who sees clean dishes in his house in a dream, it is a sign of his wife’s love for him. And seeing dirty dishes in a married man’s bedroom in a dream means that there are major disagreements with his wife. Seeing plastic utensils in a man’s dream indicates loss. Money and distress. As for seeing gold or silver utensils in a dream, it is a good omen for his financial condition. It indicates the repayment of debts, alleviation, and a feeling of happiness. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about eating with someone you love and its meaning. The meaning of seeing utensils in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing washing dishes in a woman’s dream A pregnant woman is a sign of readiness to give birth as a result of the approaching date. It also indicates stability in her psychological life and a sense of comfort as a result of the support of her husband and family. A pregnant woman who sees that she is washing gold dishes is a sign of the birth of a male. If the dishes are made of silver in a pregnant woman’s dream, it is a sign of birth. A pregnant woman who sees herself in transparent plastic containers indicates the difficulty of giving birth, and God knows best. Seeing clean, shiny containers in a bitter dream

It also indicates the stability of her psychological life and the feeling of comfort as a result of the support of her husband and family. A pregnant woman who saw that she was washing gold utensils is a sign of the birth of a male. If the dishes are made of silver in a pregnant woman’s dream, it is a sign of the birth of a woman. A pregnant woman who sees herself in transparent plastic containers shows the difficulty of childbirth, and God knows best. Seeing clean and shiny utensils in a woman’s dream

title: Interpretation of seeing a car and a bike in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a car and a bicycle in a dream: Among the visions that have many interpretations, we will try to present some of these interpretations to some dream interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin for some of the situations that the dreamer sees in the vision, but this vision must always emphasize that it is special for its owners, so an interpretation cannot be rejected on a vision. Other, even if there is a great match between the visions, because the process of interpreting visions requires many elements to be their correct interpretation. I dreamed of a vision in a dream and need to interpret it. We always advise him to seek the help of a sheikh who explains the dream and all the circumstances to him, so that he can provide the correct explanation. See also: The project in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a car and a bike in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that driving transportation in general in a dream, whether it is A bike or a car is one of the indications that the dreamer is a hardworking person who is trying to achieve his goals and dreams. Ibn Sirin also believes that the interpretation of seeing a car and a bike in a dream and a person riding a bike on a difficult road and the dreamer almost fell off the bike, and this dream indicates that the dreamer He tries to make dreams come true, but they will face some problems and difficulties. See also: Backgrounds in a dream Seeing a stolen bike or car in a dream When you dream that someone known to the dreamer is stealing a bike or a car, this is a sign that the thief is someone you love. But if one dreams that his bike or cars It was stolen and the thief did not know about it. In this case, this is an indication that there are many enemies who are trying to plan to harm the dreamer. See also: A piano in a dream. Seeing a car and a bike in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream buying a bike or a car, then this From the human race, this girl is close to marrying a young man of good character. As for an unmarried girl who sees herself falling off a bike in a dream or losing her car or bike, this dream indicates that the unmarried girl will lose one of the characters dear to her heart. As for the interpretation of the vision A car and a bicycle in a dream. When an unmarried girl sees that she is riding a bicycle and the car is on a straight road, this indicates that this girl is good and upstanding. See also: Seeing pins in a dream Seeing a married woman driving a car and a bicycle in a dream Seeing a married woman in a dream that she is riding a bicycle or A car and you cannot walk due to obstacles on the road. This dream indicates that there are some problems and disagreements between a married woman and her husband. It can also be interpreted to see a married woman driving a car and a bike in a dream without facing any problems or difficulties on the road, as this indicates that the woman has... The ability to manage household affairs. Seeing a man driving a car and a bicycle in a dreamWhen a man dreams that he is riding a bicycle in his dream and driving it quickly in a way that almost falls, this indicates that the man’s life is undisciplined. The interpretation of driving a car and a bicycle in a dream with an unknown person indicates a lack of comfort. And psychological safety. See also: R

I dreamed of a vision in a dream and need to interpret it. We always advise him to seek the help of a sheikh who explains the dream and all the circumstances to him, so that he can provide the correct explanation. See also: The project in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a car and a bike in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that driving transportation in general in a dream, whether it is A bike or a car is one of the indications that the dreamer is a hardworking person who is trying to achieve his goals and dreams. Ibn Sirin also believes that the interpretation of seeing a car and a bike in a dream and a person riding a bike on a difficult road and the dreamer almost fell off the bike, and this dream indicates that the dreamer He tries to make dreams come true, but they will face some problems and difficulties. See also: Backgrounds in a dream Seeing a stolen bike or car in a dream When you dream that someone known to the dreamer is stealing a bike or a car, this is a sign that the thief is someone you love. But if one dreams that his bike or cars It was stolen and the thief did not know about it. In this case, this is an indication that there are many enemies who are trying to plan to harm the dreamer. See also: A piano in a dream. Seeing a car and a bike in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream buying a bike or a car, then this From the human race, this girl is close to marrying a young man of good character. As for an unmarried girl who sees herself falling off a bike in a dream or losing her car or bike, this dream indicates that the unmarried girl will lose one of the characters dear to her heart. As for the interpretation of the vision A car and a bicycle in a dream. When an unmarried girl sees that she is riding a bicycle and the car is on a straight road, this indicates that this girl is good and upstanding. See also: Seeing pins in a dream Seeing a married woman driving a car and a bicycle in a dream Seeing a married woman in a dream that she is riding a bicycle or A car and you cannot walk due to obstacles on the road. This dream indicates that there are some problems and disagreements between a married woman and her husband. It can also be interpreted to see a married woman driving a car and a bike in a dream without facing any problems or difficulties on the road, as this indicates that the woman has... The ability to manage household affairs. Seeing a man driving a car and a bicycle in a dreamWhen a man dreams that he is riding a bicycle in his dream and driving it quickly in a way that almost falls, this indicates that the man’s life is undisciplined. The interpretation of driving a car and a bicycle in a dream with an unknown person indicates a lack of comfort. And psychological safety. See also: R

title: Interpretation of a butterfly in a dream: Seeing a butterfly in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a butterfly shows major changes and feedings, and other interpretations that we will interpret for single people, for married people, for pregnant women, for divorced people, for men, such as a black butterfly, or catching white prey, or a colored butterfly flying, or chasing a large or small butterfly, or a dead person, or a butterfly, or a silkworm. Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, al-Nabulsi and others on the topic: The butterfly is considered one of the most brilliant insects, as there are many beautiful species that differ in their colors and shapes. Many of us like to see butterflies and we are happy to see them flying around. Interpretation of a butterfly in a dream If you dream of a butterfly dream, it can indicate many signs, including a new change in your life. If you see the butterfly among the flowers in the garden, it means that you will get beautiful profits in your life. And if the girl dreams With a colorful butterfly, it means that it will be associated with a very strong love story. A butterfly in a dream can represent an increase in social relationships in the dreamer’s life. This may indicate his need to go out to get rid of the worries and problems that he is experiencing. So butterflies in general are a symbol of transformation because they transform from Caterpillar to ButterflyIt is one of the deepest natural wonders. Therefore, many believe that it indicates a radical change in the dreamer’s life. If you see butterflies floating, it means that news will reach you from absent friends through a letter or a meeting with a person. A butterfly can mean that you need stability in your life and focus on the most important things. If you see a butterfly Dead, this means that your goals in life are unclear. Likewise, seeing a butterfly or a mattress in a dream indicates an immoral person or an infidel who worships fire. Or seeing a butterfly or a mattress indicates fear, anxiety, and tension. Likewise, commentators said that seeing a butterfly indicates the weakness of the enemy. Which is characterized by lack of ingenuity and modesty. Whoever sees a butterfly or many butterflies in a dream, and he is a farmer or works in agriculture, the vision indicates unemployment or distress and distress. Also, seeing a butterfly in a dream indicates the presence of bad women. As for seeing a silkworm butterfly, it is a sign that Good and righteous people benefit from people and do not meet bad people. Whoever sees in a dream a butterfly or a large number of butterflies while he is sick, he will die, or his death will approach him, or the end and conclusion of his actions. Dreaming of a white butterfly portends an illness that cannot be avoided, although you will tend to Accusing yourself or someone else of harming yourself, and this is what you believe is the cause of the disease. Interpretation of a butterfly in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that whoever dreams of seeing a butterfly in a dream means that that person is one of the corrupt people who worship fire, and the person who dreams of seeing a butterfly in a dream and trying to escape from it means that This person will be exposed to intense fear, anxiety, tension, and distress. * Whoever dreams of seeing a butterfly in a dream and the butterfly is in a calm position, this means that this person will meet his enemy, but he is weak and has little dexterity and cannot harm or harm. Seeing a butterfly in a dream often indicates

title: A rooster in a dream and the interpretation of seeing a rooster in a dream

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a rooster in a dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a rooster in a dream as an indication that the dreamer will occupy a great position and a lot will be done. Seeing a rooster could be a sign for the muezzin. Ibn Sirin said that a rooster in a dream indicates the owner of the house and could be a sign for the boy. And the friend, believer, and lover. Seeing a rooster in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a rooster in a married woman’s dream is a good sign for her. Who does she see? The white rooster in a dream is a sign of happiness and joy, and here she lives with her husband. Seeing a rooster in bed in a dream is evidence of her husband’s faith in her. Seeing a rooster In the dream of a single woman: An unmarried woman who sees a white rooster in a dream, this is the good news of her marriage to her relative and evidence of the happiness and joy she enjoys with her life partner. And to see a red rooster in a dream, this is evidence that he has married someone he loves and knows well. And to see a black rooster in a dream is evidence However, you are marrying a person you do not know and you do not have feelings or love for him. Seeing a rooster in a pregnant dream: A pregnant woman who sees a rooster in a dream, this is good news that the birth is male, and God knows best, and she will have a bright future and a wonderful relationship. And seeing a rooster with ducks or geese in a dream, This is a sign of happiness and joy that will dominate him. Interpretation of seeing a rooster in a man’s dream The Man: Anyone who sees a rooster in a dream, this is a sign that he will obtain a lot of money and a lot of sustenance, and it could be a sign of him obtaining a high position in his field of work or obtaining a new job. Interpretation of seeing a rooster in a dream for a widow or divorced woman. A widow or divorced woman sees a rooster in a dream. This dream shows how much she needs a man in her life and marriage. Hearing a rooster in a dream is evidence of her imminent wedding date. And whoever eats the meat of a rooster or sees in a dream that he is slaughtering it, then this dream is It indicates that she lives in the memory of her ex-husband and will live without marrying anyone else. Interpretation of seeing a rooster flying in a dream: Anyone who dreams of a rooster outside the house and flying, this dream indicates loss of a source of livelihood, a financial crisis, and loss of a job. Interpretation of seeing a rooster buying or selling in a dream: selling a rooster In a dream, the dreamer is about to get married, so this dream indicates postponing the wedding date. Seeing buying a rooster in a dream is a sign of joy and happiness for entering the dreamer’s life and hearing happy news. The sound of a rooster in a dream: Whoever hears the sound of a rooster crowing in a dream, this is a blame and reprimand from a person dear to him. The dreamer. And the crowing of a rooster in a dream is evidence of a lot of good and happy news. Interpretation of giving a rooster in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that someone is giving him a rooster, then this dream has good skin and an indication of his high status and occupies a great position among people. Interpretation of slaughtering a rooster in a dream. And whoever dreams of slaughtering a rooster, this is A sign of his failure to perform the prayer and not responding to the call. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations about seeing a rooster in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article.

title: Interpretation of a dream about berries in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing raspberries in a dream by Ibn Sirin is one of the many interpretations that carry tidings of happiness and goodness for the dreamer. In addition to the general condition of the viewer. You may be interested in: Shrimp and eating it in a dream Interpretation of a dream about berries in a dream by Ibn Sirin In the chapter on the interpretation of seeing berries in a dream by Ibn Sirin, there are satisfactory answers to various questions about the interpretation of this vision, the most important of which are: Eating berries in a dream is very beneficial for the dreamer in general and affects his life, financial conditions and work. As for seeing the purchase of berries from the market, it is evidence of the dreamer's approach to achieving his goals and efforts at various levels. Buying berries can also indicate that the person enjoys a high status in his environment or in his work. Berries in a dream portend many offspring for the dreamer, whether male or female. While berries in a patient's dream show the extent of his suffering from his illness and the extent of the losses he incurs as a result. You may also be interested in: The Snake in a Dream Seeing berries in a man's dream In the interpretation of a dream about berries in a dream, Ibn Sirin explained the meaning of this vision for a man, and most of them showed kindness and indicated: Berries in a man's dream indicate the blessing and success that the man will obtain in the coming days. As for seeing picking berries and collecting them in a large bowl, it indicates Good tidings and happy news that the visionary will receive. Drinking mulberry juice in a dream shows a person's great ability to reach his goal and remove obstacles that hinder his progress in his field of work and in life in general. Planting mulberry trees and caring for them portends great financial gains, which the dreamer will obtain from growing trade or auspicious travel. If the dreamer is single, this vision indicates a noticeable promotion at work or moving to advanced educational stages. You may be interested: Lentils in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about mulberries for a married womanA detailed section was devoted to interpreting a dream about mulberries in a dream by Ibn Sirin about the dreams of married women and indicates:Mulberries in a married woman's dream indicate the amount of happiness she enjoys in her life with her husband, in addition to the family stability she enjoys. Seeing a married woman eating mulberries portends her imminent pregnancy. If the mulberries are white, this means that she will give birth to a girl, but if they are wild or blue, her child will be a boy. Drinking mulberry juice in a dream carries the same news for a woman. As for planting a mulberry tree in a dream, it is evidence of the imminent fulfillment of the dreamer's desires and gaining blessings and strength. The fruitful mulberry tree in a man's dream also symbolizes To his wife and shows that she is a virtuous woman who works to improve the upbringing and care of her children. Seeing berries in a dream for a pregnant woman In explaining Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing berries on a pregnant woman, there are many useful details, the most important of which are: A pregnant woman who eats berries in a dream indicates that she will give birth soon and that she will give birth easily and easily. If the berries are black, this indicates that this woman will obtain a large commodity and will earn abundant money after giving birth.

title: Interpretation of sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Eating sweets in a dream and buying sweets in a dream

preview.html: Sweets in Manamiri interpreters that the dream is good and carries many positive interpretations, but sometimes it leads to evil. In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing sweets for single women, married women, pregnant women, and men, according to Ibn Sirin and the leading interpretation scholars. Sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Sweets in a dream. The dream interpretation of sweets indicates an improvement in the financial situation and a change in circumstances for the better. It is said that seeing sweets means that the dreamer will experience happy events in the near future. It also indicates that the viewer feels happy and satisfied at the present time and thinks positively about the future.. Sweets in the dream indicate the return of the traveler and his return to his homeland and its people. If the visionary sees sweets in his dream, then he is an intelligent and cultured person who loves knowledge and developing his skills, which will lead him to success and brilliance in His working life, his ordinary life, and his past activities. Sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that a dream of sweets indicates that the dreamer is an honest and pure person who does not know hypocrisy. Sweets in the vision are a sign of the abundance of goodness and the emergence of positive changes in life, and in the event that the dreamer eats sweets. In a dream, he will soon obtain a lot of money, but after hardship and fatigue. If the dreamer eats sweets greedily, the dream indicates that he will receive many benefits from one of his friends in the coming days, and buying sweets in a dream indicates the dreamer’s feeling of comfort and psychological stability after a while. Long period of turmoil. Tension. The section includes interpretation of dreams on an Egyptian website. You can find many interpretations and questions from followers by Googling the Egyptian dream interpretation website. Sweets in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about sweets for an unmarried woman is evidence that a handsome young man will propose to her soon, and she must think carefully before making a decision. In this regard. It is said that sweets in a dream are a sign that the dreamer will soon hear happy news about her career, and seeing sweets indicates that the dreamer will soon receive a promotion at work if she seeks it. If the dreamer sees herself eating basbousa in her dream, this indicates pleasant surprises that will come. She awaits her in the coming days, the happy events that she will experience, and the positive changes that will occur in her life. Baklava in a dream foretells that she will triumph over competitors at work and achieve many achievements at the same time. Eating sweets in a dream for a single woman. In the event that the dreamer is unemployed and dreams of eating sweets, she will soon have the opportunity to work at a wonderful job with the help of a friend, and seeing her eating sweets is for women. For a single woman, it portends that she will marry a good man who will do that. Do her happy days and he will treat her with kindness and goodness. Eating a lot of sweets in a dream portends evil and will lead to the dreamer’s humiliation and inappropriate behavior. Buying sweets in a dream for a single woman Buying sweets in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign that she will soon marry a man
